snippet: in his victory speech Tuesday night, Mitt Romney focused laser-like on President Obama, delivering a version of the speech he debuted in Appleton, Wis. last week.
abstract: in his victory speech Tuesday night, Mitt Romney focused laser-like on President Obama, delivering a version of the speech he debuted in Appleton, Wis. last week.

headline.main: With Tuesday Sweep, Romney Again Trains Sights on Obama
